attributes.action: limit the number of unwanted calls
attributes.additional_details:
Limit the number of unwanted telephone calls and force callers to give contact details.

Current laws and enforcement such as telephone preference service and data protection do not prevent unwanted calls. New mothods such as automated calls made by machine often many times a day are occuring. And other types of calling will happen.

A limit to the number of calls that can be made will be simple to monitor and enforce which will save the tax payer money by having one enforecement agency and will actually stop the calls.
